subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: On Friday, New York City F.C. players got their first look at their temporary home, Yankee Stadium, where the field will be converted from baseball to soccer several times during the season.
snippet: On Friday, New York City F.C. players got their first look at their temporary home, Yankee Stadium, where the field will be converted from baseball to soccer several times during the season.
